attributes.action: Abolish University tuition fees or return to 2010 level
attributes.additional_details: Education is a right not a privilege. Education enables social mobility. MPs who have legislated charging £9,000 per year have had a free education and probably grants. This government is using divide and rule in achieving it's ambition. Graduates and non graduates depend on each other. There will be teenagers who don't apply to go to University because of the high tuition fees. Then there is the other expenses eg books, clothes, travelling, board, lodging etc.
